name: Gas Generator
explanation: Gases for resource tables. Subtables have been sorted from common to rare. See also: liquid, material, metal tables. Author: Esko Vesala. Sources: Wikipedia.org.

tables.name: gas
tables.explanation: Subtables present gases known in different types of genres and worlds. The first subtables are compatible with the largest number of  worlds, and  get more specialized towards the end. Modern and scifi subtables are not called by default to retain compatibility with the default fantasy setting. Some subtables intentionally overlap.

tables.name: mythic
tables.explanation: Imaginary gases once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: scifi
tables.explanation: Imaginary gases for science fiction worlds.
